name: side
raw:
/**
 * The side of the element to make draggable.
 *
 * @default
 *
 * 'left'
 */
summary: The side of the element to make draggable.

name: gutterSize
raw:
/**
 * The size of the resize handle in pixels.
 *
 * @default
 *
 * '5px'
 */
summary: The size of the resize handle in pixels.

name: minSize
raw:
/**
 * Number of `vw` units (relative % of the viewport).
 *
 * @default
 *
 * 15
 */
summary: Number of `vw` units (relative % of the viewport).

name: maxSize
raw:
/**
 * Number of `vw` units (relative % of the viewport).
 *
 * @default
 *
 * 75
 */
summary: Number of `vw` units (relative % of the viewport).

name: visible
raw:
/**
 * Use a visible or invisible gutter.
 *
 * @default
 *
 * false
 */
summary: Use a visible or invisible gutter.

name: persistent
raw:
/**
 * Persist width in local storage.
 *
 * @default
 *
 * false
 */
